pull_request.title: Fix crash when exiting building editor -> 2.2

pullrequest.title: Fix crash when exiting building editor -> 2.2

content.raw:
This is an issue with dart versioning. I suspect you have dart4 installed from a deb, but gazebo2 is only compatible with dart3. We are missing some cmake version filtering somewhere in the gazebo_2.2 branch.

Workaround: add `-DDARTCore_FOUND=False` to your cmake invocation.
content.html:
This is an issue with dart versioning. I suspect you have dart4 installed from a deb, but gazebo2 is only compatible with dart3. We are missing some cmake version filtering somewhere in the gazebo_2.2 branch.

Workaround: add -DDARTCore_FOUND=False to your cmake invocation.
